TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InheritanceBehavior extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the current mode of lookup for both property value inheritance, a resource lookup, and a RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup occurs when a binding uses a <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> that has its <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property set to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode?displayProperty=fullName> value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element and continue walking up the element tree to the page root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A resource lookup will query through the current element and further.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipAllNext = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element but not any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A resource lookup will query the current element but not any further.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipAllNow = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Property value inheritance lookup will not query the current element or any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A resource lookup will not query the current element or any further. A RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup will not query the current element or any further.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipToAppNext = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element but not any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A resource lookup will query the current element and will then skip over to the application and theme dictionaries, rather than walking up the element tree toward the page root.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipToAppNow = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Property value inheritance lookup will not query the current element or any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A resource lookup will not query the current element but will skip over to the application and then the theme dictionaries, rather than walking up the element tree toward the page root. A RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup will not query the current element or any further.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipToThemeNext = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element but not any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A resource lookup will query the current element and will then skip over to the theme dictionaries, rather than walking up the element tree toward the page root, or checking application dictionaries.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipToThemeNow = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Property value inheritance lookup will not query the current element or any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A resource lookup will not query the current element but will skip over to the theme dictionaries, rather than walking up the element tree toward the page root, or checking application dictionaries. A RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup will not query the current element or any further.
